wikipedia_page.main: David Deas Stevenson   (born 28 November 1941) is a Scottish former athlete. He competed for Great Britain in the men's pole vault at the 1964 Summer Olympics, where he placed 20th. He was also a successful businessman, serving as managing director of Edinburgh Woollen Mill from 1970 to 1997.

response: Dave Stevenson, Olympic pole vaulter (1964 Toyko Games) and businessman, was raised in the burgh and his company was based there.Date set for David Stevenson Freeman honour, Daily Record, 31 August 2012
